source: Good morning!
target: 'ia ora na

source: Hello!
target: 'ē, 'ia ora na

source: Where are you going?
target: e haere 'ōrua i hea

source: How are you?
target: e aha tō 'oe huru

source: I’m fine, and you?
target: maita'i ! 'e ōrua

source: Oh, we are fine too.
target: 'aita, e mea maita'i māua

source: Well, we’re walking down to the river, over there.
target: 'aita, tē pou nei māua i te pae anavai, i 'ō

source: What for?
target: haere 'ōrua i te aha

source: Are you going to be bathing?
target: haere ra 'ōrua e hopu i te vai

source: No, no! We won’t be bathing.
target: 'aita, 'aita ! e'ita māua e haere e hopu i te vai

source: We’re going fishing.
target: tē haere ra māua e tāi'a

source: We’ll try to catch some river fish for dinner.
target: e tāmata māua i te tāi'a ma'a i'a iti nō te tāmā'a i teie pō

source: Oh I see.
target: 'ā, tē ta'a atu ra

source: Is there a celebration in the village?
target: e 'ōro'a ānei tē tupu ra i te mata'eina'a

source: I didn’t know.
target: 'aita vau i fa'aro'o a'e

source: No, there’s no celebration.
target: 'aita, 'aita e 'ōro'a

source: We just need food for our family.
target: e hina'aro noa māua i te mā'a 'ia nava'i te 'utuāfare

source: My wife had bought a chicken at the market the other day
target: 'ua ho'o mai tā'u vahine i te moa i te mātete i te tahi mahana ra

source: but our children ate it all already
target: 'ua 'amu-a'ena-hia rā e tā māua tamari'i

source: now we have nothing left at home!
target: 'aita atu ra ïa e mā'a toe fa'ahou i te fare

source: Besides, we don’t have enough money anymore.
target: 'ē 'aita ato'a ho'i i nava'i fa'ahou tā māua moni

source: We really have to go fishing today.
target: 'ia haere ihoā māua e tāi'a i teie nei mahana

source: I understand.
target: nā reira, tē ta'a atu ra

source: I’m sorry that you have no food left.
target: e mea aroha roa ïa 'ōrua, 'aita e mā'a fa'ahou

source: I can help you, my friends.
target: e mara'a ia'u 'ia tauturu ia 'ōrua, e tō'u hoa

source: My husband and I, we have lots of vegetables from our garden.
target: māua tā'u tāne, e mea rahi tā māua mā'a nō roto mai i tā māua fa'a'apu

source: which he harvested yesterday, and brought home.
target: 'o tāna i tāpū mai inanahi 'e tāna i tie mai i te fare

source: If you want, we can give you some.
target: mai te peu ē, e hina'aro 'ōrua, e oti ia māua 'ia hōro'a atu i te tahi mā'a

source: Oh really? Thank you very much!
target: 'ā ? māuruuru maita'i pa'i

source: You’re welcome.
target: 'aita, mai terā ihoā

source: You’ll give us some vegetables
target: e hōro'a mai 'ōrua i te tahi mā'a tupu nā mātou

source: and we’ll give you some fish.
target: 'e hōro'a atu māua ma'a i'a iti nā 'outou

source: Tonight we will all eat together.
target: i teie ahiahi, e tāmā'a 'āmui tātou

source: Great! Good bye!
target: maita'i roa ! 'a haere ana'e ïa

source: See you later!
target: pārahi
